Function reference

All functions

VisualStats-package
Visualizations for Statistical Tests
anova_vis()
Analysis of Variance (ANOVA) Graphic
gaussian_errors_vis()
Adapted from http://web.vu.lt/mif/a.buteikis/wp-content/uploads/PE_Book/3-4-UnivarMLE.html
get_numeric_vars()
Utility function that will return numeric columns used in the regression model.
hand_washing
Bacteria counts after various hand washing techniques.
isBinary()
Check if a vector is dichotomous.
loess_vis()
Loess Visualization
logistic()
Logistic Function
logit()
Logit Function
loglikelihood_binomial()
Calculate the log likelihood for a binomial distribution.
loglikelihood_normal()
Calculate the log likelihood for a normally distributed dependent variable.
optim_save()
Warpper to optim to save iterations.
plot_likelihood()
Scatter plot with likelihood superimposed.
plot_linear_assumption_check()
Visual plot to check the assumption that the predicted values are linearly related to the predictors.
renderRmd()
Render an RMarkdown file to be included in a Shiny app.
shiny_demo()
Run a Shiny App from a Package
shiny_mle()
Visualizing Maximum Likelihood Estimation Shiny Application
shiny_server()
Shiny server.
shiny_ui()
Shiny UI
variance_vis()
Variance Visualization
